text: Boola; â€œEmbula obunyali bwokhwikhonya nohomba bwokhwilinda khumabii halali shinga Nyasaye yenya. Ne embetsanga mbu ndamanya akefisile ndakhametele okhukhola amalayi mubunji, ne obubii bwosibwosi shibwakhanzulilekhwo tawe, esie shendi shiosi shiosi tawe halali Omwikanyilisi nende Omusuubisia wabandu basuubilanga
